trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: In the first round of combat, the Elven Brigand attacks against any creature with {@status Surprised|XPHB} condition are made with Advantage.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The elven brigand deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the elven brigand (high elf) that does not has the {@condition Incapacitated} condition and the elven brigand doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The elven brigand can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven brigand has advantage on saving throws against the  {@condition Charmed} condition, and magic can't put the elven brigand to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Elven Brigand makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow

action.name: Volley
entries: The Elven Brigand fires a volley of arrow in a 30 foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 4d4}) Piercing damage and its Speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the Elven Brigand's next turn. On a successful save a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The brigand captain has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the brigand captain to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Brigand Captain makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Slashing damage. Two-Hand {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}).

action.name: Redeployment
entries: The Brigand Captain chooses an ally within 60 feet, and the ally immediately takes its turn in place of the Brigand Captain's turn.

bonus.name: Courageous Aspect (Recharges: Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Brigand Captain exudes a field of heroism for 1 minute. During this time, the Brigand Captain or any ally within 30 feet of the Brigand Captain is Immune to the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition.
